embeds.title: Linking Info Page
embeds.description:
- Linking your account is a quality-of-life feature that offers several benefits.
- You can use commands without specifying a player, manage your sessions, and more.
- To link your account, make sure that your Discord account is connected to Hypixel with your current Discord tag.
- Upon linking, if the target player does not already have an active session, one will be created automatically
